text: Changing default python to another version
Currently when I use "python" command, it points to python2.6.
I have installed python3.1 and I want the "python" command point to python3.1.

code:
mahmood@mpc:~$ which python 
/usr/bin/python
mahmood@mpc:~$ ls -l /usr/bin/python
lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 9 2010-11-24 16:14 /usr/bin/python -> python2.6
mahmood@mpc:~$ uname -a
Linux orca 2.6.32-24-server #39-Ubuntu SMP Wed Jul 28 06:21:40 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux
